price: "Bawalah semua kuda itu kembali kepadaku." Lalu dia mengusap-usap kaki dan leher kuda itu.752)
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ
footnotes: *752) Sebagian mufasir ada yang menerjemahkan ayat 33 demikian, “Bawalah kembali semua itu kepadaku, lalu dia memotong kaki dan lehernya.”

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
